website_summaries.verdict: If 8GB of music isn't enough for you, this MP3 player lets you stream music wirelessly from your phone via Bluetooth - as long as you're not underwater.
pros: 8GB capacity with 10 hours of playback time
Device and headphones withstand moisture from heavy perspiration to being submerged as deep as 12 ft. Ergonomically designed
Snap clip attaches to goggles, swimsuit, or trunks and rotates for your best angle
Many different earpieces for perfect fit
cons: Some owners say volume seems a little low for listening in a pool

customer_reviews.title: Picks up wireless connection with phone next to pool
customer_reviews.text: My husband swims laps at the gym 5-7 days a week. He’s typically in the pool anywhere between 30 and 60 minutes. He’s been using these every single time and has never had one problem. He actually didn’t even download songs to it. Instead he plays his downloaded songs or Pandora on his phone and the Bluetooth wireless function is able to pick it up with his phone next to the pool. He says it works perfectly and sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: WamQQk

customer_reviews.title: More Problems Than Solutions.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for swimming laps. Bluetooth is spotty on a 25 yard pool — I generally start losing signal at the far end when synced to my phone. You can load a playlist to get around Bluetooth limitations, but being limited to a fixed playlist is disappointing. Sound quality is good, not great. You have to get a good fit with the earbuds, as otherwise the speakers get wet and won’t function until dry. The receiver being strapped to goggles works okay. You can’t see the receiver so it’s not terribly easy to use controls. Overall I’m not wild about these. Probably will return.
customer_reviews.author: Armi

customer_reviews.title: It comes with all the ear pieces so you can try what works best for you
customer_reviews.text: I swim on a daily basis during the week and this has made it tremendously more enjoyable. It comes with all the ear pieces so you can try what works best for you. It also has several instrumentals downloaded for the days you can’t access WiFi (preference) or leave your phone behind. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: christine hagopian

customer_reviews.title: I love the sound but the clip broke after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound but the clip broke after 1 month.😢. Update: I was contacted by H2O Audio and they are replacing the player. I am impressed by the quick response from them.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rains

customer_reviews.title: What I liked least is the ear pieces
customer_reviews.text: I'm in a water aerobic boot camp class. My teacher yells and I can still hear him. My music helps the class go by quickly. It comes through clearly for the hour of being splashed etc. What I liked least is the ear pieces. I have small ears and they continued to fall out. After more use, they stay in now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I use them for swimming laps, the sound is great and they fit perfectly. I only wear goggles, no hat and never had any issues of the headphones falling out. Together with a watch for counting laps/distance, music makes the training super easy as I don’t have to think of anything during the workout.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great sound! Update..my pc stopped recognizing my mp3 player. And I wrote and asked the company and they said to reboot your pc (without it connected) and it should work. And it did...for those who had the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mizzy

customer_reviews.title: I liked the idea of being able to listen to music ...
customer_reviews.text: I give this product one star for potential. I liked the idea of being able to listen to music while swimming laps and chose this product bc of the Bluetooth option. It was easy to Bluetooth and great poolside.but never worked properly in the water. The music cut off with every head turn. Total disappointment. The ONLY reason i still have this product is bc i missed the return cut off. Money wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Greer

customer_reviews.title: Great water headset.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a little over a month and love it. I found putting it on deck halfway across longest length allows me to use bluetooth the whole time swimming. I did notice it does disconnect if your unit goes underneath water by even just a little but I usually don't have the unit underwater. I can swim a good week at 45 minutes a day before really needing to charge. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Vonderheide

customer_reviews.title: They were great until they weren't
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these for the first 15 minutes. I paired to my phone, kicked back and floated in my pool listening to a podcast. It was great. Yeah, blutooth doesn't work well underwater. That's acceptable. Its the 16th minute that the unit filled with water from factory misaligned gasket, shorted out, and became very hot to the touch. Thats when I realized there was an issue. It wasn't built terrible. I just got one where the gasket shifted when the shell was assembled. It happens. 3 stars cause it didn't suck at first. the headphones were great.
customer_reviews.author: KPG C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in the water 7 days a week and my mp3 player is too. However, my usual brand no longer plays my music because of changes to iTunes format. I have been trying for months to figure out the conversion. Then I saw THIS player that DOES play iTune music---with no conversion necessary AND it has blue tooth. I can rock in the water again!! The player cost more than my usual one, but it is SO worth it. A Big Plus is the customer service. A quick email with a question prompted a quick answer.
customer_reviews.author: mambert

customer_reviews.title: Garbage right out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: This device did not work right out of the box! I loaded 10 songs just to try it out and only two played. Then, the unit would "not" turn off. It was suspect before I even opened the box since the packaging appeared to have been opened several times already. The flaps were all bent and turned out, like it was a previous return. Never got to use it in the water so I cannot speak to the operational quality. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. BiggySmall

customer_reviews.title: Works great for swimming laps
customer_reviews.text: Works great for lap swimming! I bought this specifically for swimming laps. I had tried some of the water proof ear buds but Bluetooth does not work under water, in spite of their claims. So I bought this one. The ear buds are comfortable and the receiver is small, light and has a clip on it to attach to the goggle strap. It’s easy to use and has good sound. Our pool is 40 ft (13.3 m) and i have food reception while keeping my phone on one end, so I would assume you can swim a 25m pool if you put the phone in the middle. I don’t use the MP3 player function so I can’t speak to yet.
customer_reviews.author: WittiCrew

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth in a pool?
customer_reviews.text: Overall a ok device and better than doing nothing in the pool whilee swimming laps but the shortcomings. Bluetooth reception across a 25m pool is marginal at best so you use the mp3. But in an age of streaming music and downloadable playlists this unit falls short..... would be significantly better if it could hold a downloaded playlist from Spotify or Pandora or another streaming service. Clip on back kept coming off goggles. Finally 2 weeks in and the ear plugs right side speaker blew up...... now to spend more $ on a new set of earphones.
customer_reviews.author: Carlo P.

customer_reviews.title: easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: i have been using this to walk laps in the pool...for about a month, and have had no issues with it. I use the feature where i pair it to my phone...keep my phone in my bag by the side of the pool, and use Pandora so i can listen to my music while walking laps. The earbuds stay in really nicely. The sound quality is great. The clip works great. Just know that the wifi stops working even if you go just a few inches underwater....so don't expect to use the wifi part if you are swimming laps. But you can still download music and use it that way, from the memory. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy unless you have your own MP3 music already downloaded.
customer_reviews.text: A bit frustrated. Its hard to add music but they offer support and I plan to call. Its just pretty complicated if you donnt already have mp3 format music. I would have bought another waterfii but am moving away from apple and honestly have had two that didnt last long. I bet this would be great if most music wasnt from streaming services these days.
customer_reviews.author: htwlrs

customer_reviews.title: Cant find how to return
customer_reviews.text: I swim 1.5 miles a day I just got this yesterday I not sure how I lived without this. bluetooth works great and you won't know it's there Update won't charge. trying to return sellers web site no info says see amaz web site past 30 days no go there have extended warranty they say see seller
customer_reviews.author: G. M. Cattell

customer_reviews.title: GAME CHANGER
customer_reviews.text: I searched for hours and hours finding an mp3 I could use for swimming laps. This one seemed to work the best so I got two. One for me and one for my mom for her birthday. We swim laps together. This product has EXCEEDED expectations and I know if it craps out on me one day the customer service is phenomenal. 10/10 would recommend. We love it and it has changed the lap swimming game for the both of us.
customer_reviews.author: ashley anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Excellent customer service. LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, I used a water proofed Ipod shuffle which is easier to use while swimming (changing volume or track) however the sound quality of H2O is far better and the fact that you can save music without having to go through Itunes is a major advantage, the device is more like a USB. I had an issues with the connectivity after a couple of months and once I contacted customer service they immediately sent me a replacement unit without any cost. I completely endorse this product and would recommend it for all without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: farid

customer_reviews.title: Improvement over previous Model - Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I have an earlier version of this player that required. converting files to MP3 format. It was kind of a pain. This version, I can just drag any file over which is so much easier. Customer service was GREAT! The initial one sent to me had a glitch, it kept switching to Bluetooth or stopped playing after one or two songs. They immediately replaced it, sent an envelope to return the defective one - and it works like a charm. Great customer service is important to me. I don't wear a swim cap, so the earbuds do fall out, minor problem.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Vasser

customer_reviews.title: Love this device
customer_reviews.text: I am a swimmer and this works for my freestyle with the blue tooth. I love listening to Pandora and enjoying my swim. You cannot do kick turns with the Bluetooth but that was an easy remedy for me. You can download mp3s and it auto play whenever on but I only use this device for the Bluetooth. I leave my phone at one end of the pool and the single is fine the entire 25meters of the pool. It’s essential to every swim.
customer_reviews.author: You want how much?!?!

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Pause and Playback messed up I actually bought two of these devices for myself and my wife Pro it is waterproof Cons no volume in order to play or Pause you need to press Bluetooth button (at random ) in order to connect that you need to press the play button (at random ) it just stops working randomly battery life does not last long I'm going to be returning them
customer_reviews.author: Abe

customer_reviews.title: This is total garbage and a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: After 5 swims, mine no longer connects to the computer. My previous (cheaper!) mp3 player lasted five years and hundreds of swims. This is total garbage and a waste of money. Also, bluetooth doesn't work the moment you go underwater... which is fine, unless you ever do flip turns or swim backstroke. So prepare to lose sound about five seconds out of every thirty, if you aren't playing from memory.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: OMG..My swimming is so much more enjoyable. I am so happy i found this product. I am so very pleased with this company products!
customer_reviews.text: Product is the best, company is top notch! I wasn't certain I could figure out the music transfer, this company offered to make a video, to help me. Such kindness and customer understanding (you see I'm a Grandma that is technology challenges me, visual instructions helps me a lot). Above and beyond......product has great Audio, perfect size and light weight, well made the clip on the back will clip on bathing suit or goggles.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Has problems, but 3 stars for what it does do
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for the bluetooth, but I have come to find out that I can't use it while swimming. When it is under water, the connection gets cut off so the music plays only when I have the mp3 above water. It does play from memory under water, but the buds after only a short time while become muffled which shouldn't happen. Besides all the problems, it is waterproof and the music does play from memory so I gave it 3 stars. Battery lasts a long time
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: work great for lap swimming!
customer_reviews.text: They do the job. makes swimming fun and the time goes by fast enjoying the tunes. I still can't handle adding music, i have to get help with that. but my brother loaded a huge selection for me to enjoy. I love the bluetooth. It works great as long and you don't submerse the unit underwater. so don't do turns on laps and no back strokes. i am able to get a signal across my pool (about 40 feet). i also like the shuffle play on loaded music.
customer_reviews.author: Grace the baker

customer_reviews.title: Finally an MP3 Player for Swimming !
customer_reviews.text: It works exactly as described, and once you've got music on the device, you can listen to music underwater as easily as you would from your phone or a "dry" MP3 player. Your computer will see the device as just another connected memory device, and music is just copied as you would onto a micro SD. Sound quality is pretty good, and it makes grinding out laps not nearly as boring as it otherwise can be. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Steve from South Bend

customer_reviews.title: Great Waterproof Audio Player
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised and pleased that this waterproof mp3 player works so well. I use it every time I do laps at the pool. The sound is great! The only con I have is that one of the ear plugs doesn’t stay in my ear. Probably my fault and am still working on it.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lover

customer_reviews.title: Truly Works! Well-Made & Great Customer Support if Needed
customer_reviews.text: I swim laps at the Y & use this to listen to music & podcasts. Great sound, really works! Been using for months now. Be patient with fitting the different ear pieces to find the ones that work for you. I found my perfect combo after a couple tries. Bluetooth easily pairs, instructions very easy to follow. FYI: If I want to use the Bluetooth capabilities (instead of transferring the music files to it directly), I have to use one of the far lanes & place my bag with my phone in it half of the length of the pool. Unfortunately, Bluetooth tech is just limited like that, nothing to do with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hollingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Quality product from a quality company!
customer_reviews.text: The sound on this player and headphones is excellent and the company truly stands behind their product. I don't swim with goggles; I swim with a hat or visor but the cord on the headphones that came with this player was too short for my needs. I called them to see if I could perhaps exchange the short cord ones for a longer cord that I saw on their web page, and they immediately agreed to send me the longer cord model at no charge along with a mailer to allow me to return the short cord model at no cost to me. Can't ask for much more concern and positive response from any product manufacturer than that!
customer_reviews.author: David Long

customer_reviews.title: Can’t review what I can’t use
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to use this, but it arrived with no headphones. It’s like I bought just the player on its own and not the headphones like the ad says. I even bought the four year guarantee. I swear I looked repeatedly, but this is all that came. Can I get these sent to me or return this item?
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: Swimming laps is much more enjoyable now :)
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you figure out which ear tips work best -- took some trial and error until I settled on the one's that came pre-installed -- otherwise the audio might appear to "drop out". Overall I'm extremely happy with my purchase. I'll update the review if I run into any battery/dependability issues, but I've used the players several times now and have no complaints. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: LEV

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed....
customer_reviews.text: The Bluetooth feature which is the main reason I got it doesn’t work well. I swim at the gym in a standard pool and it looses connection to my music. I even placed my phone in the middle of the pool closest to my lane and by the time I reached each end the connection was lost. When it is connected sound is fine and I haven’t had an issue with the battery but since it didn’t work as I wanted I’ve only used it once. I cannot seem to easily download music from my iTunes either. More direction or a simple way of connecting would also be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Sharissa Andreas

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I've used many underwater audio players in the past. This is the most user friendly b/c the control buttons are big and easy to access mid swim. It's also pretty easy to load. In my case I mostly listen to audio books that I load using my laptop. I took off a star b/c I find the earphones a bit short as I don't wear goggles, so I must attach the player to my bathing suit strap. I've had a couple of questions and the customer service for this product is AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Goes mute when call comes to the phone
customer_reviews.text: I am returning the device. I bought this device so that I can listen to my coach while swimming. The idea was that I will stay in a call with her while swimming. That way anything wrong that I am doing, she can say it in my ears, in real time. This would have helped me to correct myself on the go. I did not need a microphone (as I will not be talking. I am swimming!). I just needed to listen to the call. However, the moment a phone call comes, the bluetooth stops working. Therefore the device becomes completely useless to me!
customer_reviews.author: Yale Indi

customer_reviews.title: BlueTooth.
customer_reviews.text: After 4 uses, I am sold. Works as advertised. I've been using primarily as a BlueTooth Player with Spotify. Sound and range have been great. The feature of the device talking to you after pressing key buttons is wonderful. I suggest the manufacturer put some "how to" for care and maintenance. So as you may not know Bluetooth does not travel underwater, I've been keeping the strap/player high on the "downward facing point of my head", this helps to prevent the Bluetooth from cutting out and keeps the device out of the water. I did buy with extended warranty. I will update.
customer_reviews.author: Jill C.

customer_reviews.title: USB port may not work until dried after submersion in water. Great Cuctomer Service.
customer_reviews.text: Product was purchashed for listening to music while swimming laps in a club pool. Blue tooth worked as advertised with expected cut outs when iPhone poolside and going underwater. MP3 playing is superb with no cuto outs. Connecting to computer to add more songs after submersion in water is another problem altogether. Invest in an air compressor can to blow out USB port if you plan to connect to your computer shortly after swimming or otherwise submerging in water. Otherwise may not connect to computer. Great Customer Service.
customer_reviews.author: RICKY C.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful MP3 Music Player that is tough, waterproof, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through 2 MP3 players and they could not keep up with me. I am a runner and sweat a lot...so if it is not water-tight...they can't take the action. The H2O Audio Stream 2 100% Waterproof MP3 Music Player is easy to use- I downloaded my running music easily. The sound quality is awesome and it is a solid built MP3 Player that is tough like a tank and can take a 6 mile run without missing a note. Love the device.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: this device  is a fraud!!
customer_reviews.text: Not ONLY you can not go under the water ... with it but its does not work!! don't even go further then 5 f and if u ONLY wanted to use it and sit around the pool ( Not under ) you may have a chance to hear some music In one side since both ears never works same time.. horrible products the wires are so bad and the connections are too very poorly done. don't mention customer services no one ever return the call or worry about that the deice is fraud ! but it is!!!
customer_reviews.author: Triangleusa

customer_reviews.title: Water Music Wonder
customer_reviews.text: I've been using H20 Audio products for a number of years to accompany my swim and this latest version of their waterproof MP3 player is the best yet. Fits well and much less cumbersome than some players or a phone jacket. Sound quality is wonderful even underwater and I'm happy they've made it easier to transfer songs directly from iTunes without conversion. After a number of months, I had an issue with charging at one point, but support was fantastic and replaced the unit under warranty. Altogether very pleased with the product and the company behind it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Great item! Exactly what I needed to make my ...
customer_reviews.text: Great item! Exactly what I needed to make my water work out more motivating. The player scrambles your songs rather than play them in the order you installed them. This is the only drawback.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Great Product so far.....great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Update!! So the device worked great right out of the box. Then it died and no longer charged. I contacted customer support and they were very quick to respond to my email AND get another device shipped out with a prepaid envelope for the damaged unit to be returned. New unit has been working great now for the past week and half. Support gave a key piece of information for caring for the player. WAIT UNTIL IT IS COMPLETELY DRY BEFORE YOU CHARGE THE DEVICE.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Soska

customer_reviews.title: Isnt compatible with my computer.
customer_reviews.text: The first time I ordered this device it didnt work. They sent me another one. This system worked after swimming with it two times. When I tried to connect it to my computer to add more music I received a message that the item was malfunctioning. I called amazon customer support and was told it is not compatible with my computer. I am using a gaming computer with windows 10.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Gilbert-Espada

customer_reviews.title: Works great but...
customer_reviews.text: I should have just bought a waterproof mp3 player but the bluetooth function is honestly pretty useless. As soon as it goes beneath an inch of water the bluetooth disconnects. Unless you attach it to the top of your head, which I have tried (that works fine), but as soon as you go under for turns it disconnects. Very annoying. But as an mp3 player with music stored on it directly, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: x

customer_reviews.title: SO FAR IT HAS BEEN GREAT IT MAKES DOING MY WORKOUT IN THE POOL SO ...
customer_reviews.text: SO FAR IT HAS BEEN GREAT IT MAKES DOING MY WORKOUT IN THE POOL SO MUCH EASIER. SOUND IS GREAT, HAVE NOT HAD ANY ISSUES.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Prymula

customer_reviews.title: The BEST customer service
customer_reviews.text: Best customer service! Fast and helpful and so polite!!!!.... This MP3 player made swimming laps fun! I clip on to my goggles strap above my left ear and it works really well. I have not loaded music onto mine - only used Bluetooth for Pandora. Works great for swimming freestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L

customer_reviews.title: not user friendly for programming. Low di
customer_reviews.text: This player worked ok for about a 15 swim sessions. I had some difficulty getting music on the player using a MacBook it was not user friendly. This player was totally dead and would not charge again after not being used for a few months due to the closing of all the pools recently. I just bought a water proof iPod shuffle from underwater audio. I had another waterproof iPod shuffle from Waterford that worked great for several years. Of course these are a Very expensive option but as the saying goes you get what you pay for buy once cry once.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for water aerobics
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I wanted it for. I do water aerobics and can’t always make it to class. With this I can do it anytime. Completely waterproof I clip the player on my collar and go about my exercise. You can load songs to the MP3 player or play via Bluetooth from your phone. Going underwater blocks of the Bluetooth but the MP3 works underwater. The sound quality is very good considering it’s for use in or under water😀
customer_reviews.author: RobH2ohues

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Waterproof MP3 for Swimming
customer_reviews.text: This MP3 player is amazing! Headphones stay in during flip turns and aggressive swimming. I use a swim cap to help keep headphones in place and hook the device on the front of my suit. It does take some patience to set it up initially with an Apple computer, but emails to the seller were returned very quickly with helpful information for how to download music. As stated but the seller, the bluetooth doesn't work under water or over 30 feet away, but the MP3 music is good enough for me. Sound is great, stays in place, customer service is great, easy to use, long battery life, and plenty of storage. I highly recommend this H2O Stream.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lap swimming with tunes, works great with bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Done a couple of workouts and its been working great. As advertised, if your head goes underwater e.g. flips you lose connectivity, but it seems to bounce right back. Eventually u will get water in your ears and the sound degrades but that's to be expected, I've managed to go about 40 minutes worth of 800s before that happens. Going to experiment with a cap to see if there's a difference. Note that I only use it with BT, have not tried to load any mp3s and probably wont bother as since I'm happy to listen to tunes or podcasts from my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Newcastle Highlands

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price when tether swimming
customer_reviews.text: This MP3 player is working out great in the pool everyday doing laps. Easy to down load the music Sound is as good as it can be in the water Only draw back is the headphones not the greatest , need to update to the next version So far all is good
customer_reviews.author: Energy

customer_reviews.title: Corrosion
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it took 3 months to turn this Music player useless. Two main issues appeared: 1) corrosion of the interior socket. It gradually slowed charging the apparatus. Further, the PC was unable to recognize the player thus I was stuck with the original playlist as uploading new play list was impossible. 2) the connecting cord seems too short thus the ear plugs have a tendency to "leave' my ear while swimming. Of note I used it only in our community pool. Additional note - it is somewhat problematic to transfer songs in my iTunes library to the player. Better methodologies are warranted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This works great!
customer_reviews.text: I used a ipod shuffle for years, but the company that I had been buying them from went out of business. I wasn't sure that I would like this mp3 player, but it is really great. Holds twice as much music, it's less expensive and it's easy to use. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: C. DeMars

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work
customer_reviews.text: I'm working with this swimming. Like that it has more space for tunes vs the Shuffle (which I like too) Wish the ear plugs(longer) had better rubber ends like the Shuffle has and also that the line was coiled like the Shuffle. I notice not all my macs recognize the unit. It seems early OSX works better than the later systems.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: save your money
customer_reviews.text: have had 2 of these. returned 1st. for would not hold a charge. now on the 2nd with same problem plus wont even attempt to charge. did not use heavily, once or twice every other week or so. when it worked it worked very well. but for $80 it should have a must better life span than a couple of months. better luck next product.
customer_reviews.author: bruce bopp

customer_reviews.title: Works relly well, once you find the right earbud.
customer_reviews.text: I have small ear canals, and it took several tries to find the right size earbud for each ear. Once that was done, the player works well. Sound is good, and the buds stay in for a least an hour while I swim. (I breath out under water through my nose, so there is a lot of background noise, which is not the players fault). Customer service is great, when I broke the clip, I got a replacement in days. Very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Consultant

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I had receive two H2O Audio Stream 2 100% Waterproof MP3 Music Player The first player was defective and did not even switch on and left it at garbage, seller was kind and send me replacement and the replacement was defective too. Laptop does not recognize it. When I connect mp3 to laptop, laptop makes a sound that mp3 connected to laptop, after that laptop is freezing, and only restart helps to wake up laptop. After that laptop does not recognize mp3. I will definitely will not suggest anyone to buy this mp3. It is better to find a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Yuri

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Makes my water workouts a blast. Easy to use. Charge lasts about a week. I usually pair with bluetooth as I keep my head above water. I need to follow the instructions for making mp3 lists for when I swim laps.
customer_reviews.author: my210cents

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: This player is good, not great. The sound quality falls behind the waterproof iPod shuffle and the size is 3-4 times the size as well. It's much cheaper than the iPod shuffle and thus is a bargain for those that just want to listen to something while the laps pass by.
customer_reviews.author: Daron Goodson

customer_reviews.title: It works beyond expectations
customer_reviews.text: I need to do physiotherapy in a water pool, and wanted some music to kill the time. This little device does the job perfectly, the sound is not what I get from my $3000 A&K380 + $1000 Sennheiser IE800, but for 3% of that cost, I get 70% of that experience, which is remarkable.
customer_reviews.author: christian halsey-solomon

customer_reviews.title: Started out ok but......
customer_reviews.text: When I put it on before I got in the water it was great. Got in the water and it was still pretty good sound quality. Then the left one went out. Only sound from right side. Lame. Also doesn't keep water out of ears. Also doesn't stream Bluetooth underwater. You'll need to download music to device off you swim underwater.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Happy Swimmer:  H2O Audio Stream 2 & Underwater Headphones reintroduced music to swim workouts
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy my H2O Audio Stream 2 and underwater headphones. I’ve been swimming since I was three and was a competitive synchronize swimmer in my youth-so music and water together have brought me so much joy as I "danced" in the water. I was thrilled to find a product that made my lap swimming more enjoyable by reintroducing music to my workouts. Downloading my music to the MP3 player is easy, the sound quality is excellent and it has a long battery life. I is real highly recommend H2O stream, the products and customer service are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth C. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality
customer_reviews.text: This is super easy to use. I wear glasses, so once I put on my goggles it's very hard to see what I'm doing. The H2O has very distinctive buttons that allow me to know exactly what I'm pressing. But the most important thing is, the sound quality is amazing! Very reliable, good battery life too!
customer_reviews.author: Mónica

customer_reviews.title: Updated review - enjoying music while I swim. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: **Review updated to 5 stars! The company contacted me and sent a new improved player. I am very happy with it! My swim goes so much better with music. I really appreciate the great customer service too!** I liked the mp3 player, though I couldn't get the earbuds to stay in while swimming. I bought a waterproof handset from swimbuds and that worked great until my mp3 player refused to charge. I've only had it for about 2 months. Big disappointment! Would have rated it higher if it had worked longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: MP4 compatible
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with being able to use my mp4 music files. Super easy to load music. Sound quality isn’t the greatest and they do cut out sporadically, but these made swimming laps so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: broke after 4 uses
customer_reviews.text: I used this four times total, sound quality got really low during 3rd use and right ear bud stopped working 4th time I put them in my ears. Probably used underwater for about 3 hours total (Including all swims) I don't see a way to get my money back either so I recommend you do not buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Renee M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Catch it on sale and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -great sound -many earbud options to get the right fit -rated waterproof at a reasonable depth for most pools Cons -getting the right fit may take a few swim sessions -a bit pricey for my taste when not on sale Why it loses a star: As far as I can tell, you can't put folders on this thing. Meaning you can't switch from a shuffled music playlist to a properly ordered podcast playlist without manually doing it on your computer.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah F.

customer_reviews.title: Worked well at first with good ear buds but died after a half dozen uses.
customer_reviews.text: I was initially very pleased with this product, although it had a hard time keeping a charge. If you charged it within a few days of use, it was very good. The ear buds worked very well. Unfortunately, the unit died and would not accept a charge or be recognized by my computer just a few days after the end of my return window. The total number of swims I got in with it was only about a half dozen. I made a comment about this with no response from the vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice mp3
customer_reviews.text: I was never able to get the music from my computer to the mp3 but it was very nicely made and it sounds nice. It doesn’t have a Bluetooth option but you cannot use Bluetooth while swimming
customer_reviews.author: Skylar J.

customer_reviews.title: Works with Apple
customer_reviews.text: A bit of work getting music on from Apple Mac but it works. Need to convert Apple format to MP3. Good coed length for goggle strap mount, I found putting unit side strap better than relying on the clip to secure.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Best player of all that I have used, and I tried a lot of them. The earbuds are also the best, nice big speakers and opening give a much richer sound than the others, plus they give such a variety of ear pieces you’ll be able to find some that’ll seal in your ear.
customer_reviews.author: EFreeman

customer_reviews.title: Great waterproof Audio. Having issues with ear buds
customer_reviews.text: I had a little issue loading the music. And I can’t get the headphones to stay in while swimming. They don’t stay in tight enough . Sound is great when I can get the buds to stay in. I use it with a old H2O headset for now.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: H2O AUDIO, THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: Because of your GREAT product, I am now swimming more laps in our olympic size pool than I ever thought possible. Thank you H2O AUDIO ! Additionally, your team at H2O deserves the highest of marks for great customer service. I can not thank you enough for your outstanding product and service. All of my neighbors now know about your H2O Audio. I even tell unfamiliar neighbors who maybe swimming laps near me about it. Finally, thank you Joe for your friendly professionalism. H2O AUDIO - 10 STAR RATING FOR SURE
customer_reviews.author: linda castle-hill

customer_reviews.title: This is 80’s technology..do not buy
customer_reviews.text: You have to convert modern technology to the Stone Age in order to get music on this device. It’s a complete joke. You spend more time downloading and converting files than you do swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This product is truly a game changer. I ordered the waterproof headphones AND the MP3 player (Bluetooth doesn’t work underwater!). And they are the COOLEST thing. I waited to write the review until i’ve used it about 15 times and it still works good as new. It makes swimming laps much more entertaining, time goes by faster, and I get a better work out. Plus everyone at the pool is always asking me about them!! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Bocch

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth connects with Iphone after pairing just fine. Plays MP3 format music fine. I will try the MP4 Itunes format downloaded to the disk and update this review later.
customer_reviews.author: Liz In Sarasota

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working abruptly after a single use.
customer_reviews.text: The product was a gift to my husband who is a swimmer. He used it fine for a day and the next morning the device didnt work. We tried charging it but no success. Even tried drying it in the sun but even after 2-3 days the device didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: The initial unit would not hold a charge, they sent me a replacement and upgraded to the newest version, within 2 days. The second unit had a problem charging also, again replaced in 2 days. The third one works well, holds a charge and I only have to charge once a week and I get 8 hours of play on one charge. Pleased with the product and impressed with the way the company was eager to make it right when the product was not meeting expectations. I would buy other products from this company.
customer_reviews.author: chari long

customer_reviews.title: The directions and website are pathetic. It’s very
customer_reviews.text: After plugging it in via the usb, It is not recognized andI am unable to use it. The directions and website are pathetic. It’s very frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for swimming
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, easy to use. Have not had any problem use it three times a week in the pool. Makes time go so fast when you can listen to your favorite tunes.
customer_reviews.author: linda wolf

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical about this device but figured I could return it. Loaded iTunes music, turned it on and was surprised at sound quality. It weighs less than my shuffle and it’s waterproof container. So far so great
customer_reviews.author: gesch

customer_reviews.title: Love the product, the company and customer support!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product and loved it from the very beginning. It was not charging, but the customer service form H20 was amazing. They sent me a replacement right away and have been in contact, to make sure that everything is OK. I mainly use the Bluetooth and is amazing, I enjoy my swimming time even more now that I have this product. Thank you, Joe, from customer support for all your help! You guys are the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for use.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't quite what I was looking for but it is a solid product. I wanted something to connect to a bluetooth speaker and didn't quite attain that here. If you're a swimmer though it is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Best item I’ve bought from Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product; Excellent customer service. Couldn’t be happier! After a brief period of choosing the right ear plugs & transferring music, swimming has been a blast! Highest Recommendation!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Morlock

customer_reviews.title: Swimming Laps
customer_reviews.text: Had for about a week and is working great I use the Bluetooth and will keep a signal the full length of a 50 meter pool.
customer_reviews.author: dcrockett

customer_reviews.title: Sound is superb
customer_reviews.text: I love how crisp and clear the skins quality is. This product was changed with a rubber protective cover when I had an issue with the first model. All of the problems I had with this model were immediately fixed and the company are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: jarrards5

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It was obviously used. Songs were already downloaded. Could only download 3 songs on it. A malfunction message appears when connected to computer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Short Cord
customer_reviews.text: Works fine while i am swimming laps. Earphone cord could be longer. I have an extension but it is too long. Finally put player on mask strap and that works ok. Sound is very good.
customer_reviews.author: gary n. campbell

customer_reviews.title: Compact and lightweight. Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd swim radio and this is the best so far. Sound is clear. I would suggest the attachment be better made as it has a tendency to slip off my goggle strap. Enjoy using it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia G. Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Too early to give full evaluation
customer_reviews.text: Once I learned how to sync with my computer it was easy. Had trouble syncing at first. The sound was disappointing to me. I bought it for my wife who thought it was fine. That's what counts. Have not used it much yet.
customer_reviews.author: McDonald R. Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Great device. Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Quality built device. Pretty good sound quality and no complaints so far while swimming. It comes with some relaxing music pre-loaded so it's ready to go after charging, which is cool. The multitude of ear tips makes it perfect to find the perfect fit. Only cons so far: Button function could have been more intuitive. Play/pause button will pause Bluetooth play but press it again and it plays from memory. Bummer they didn't use a micro usb charge port, if you lose charge cord, might be SOL.
customer_reviews.author: CVT

customer_reviews.title: NO customer service
customer_reviews.text: I am having trouble with the blue tooth option and I cannot get any tech support....just FAQ's which do NOT address my issue
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Shorts out and dosent work very well.
customer_reviews.text: Dosent work very well. Shorts out and I have to keep stopping to shake them to get it working again.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Ok Product
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about be able to swim and listen to music! This product worked ok had problems keeping earbuds in while I swam, then one ear would work and the other wouldn’t. When it worked I did enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Montano

customer_reviews.title: Maybe there is something better out there.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and followed the directions given to download music and only one song kept repeating even though when connected to my laptop it said there were a lot of songs on the device. Headphones constantly fall out while swimming and sound quality is not good.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Great company
customer_reviews.text: Since it is MP3 it needs a few steps to convert your apple music--being an old fogey found this confusing and a real human on the other end of the phone talked me through. Unit works as promised and it is half the price of some of the "waterproofed" iPod shuffles
customer_reviews.author: Little bay

customer_reviews.title: Thought is was the best headphones and player
customer_reviews.text: The headphones came in the mail on time. Great! I can lap swim that afternoon. Bingo. They work great. Sealed in the ears and plays very well. Three months later it just stopped working. Not pleased
customer_reviews.author: Tim Martin

customer_reviews.title: the quality of sound is good. in water was good too
customer_reviews.text: the quality of sound is good. in water was good too. it made my swimming time became less boring. Just the player jumped to next song before the whole song finished. The seller was so nice to try to help. They exchanged a new one for me once i applied the exchange but sadly the new one had the same problem so I refunded all of them. But beside this problem everything of this player was really good.
customer_reviews.author: Kati

customer_reviews.title: I Like the concept of the player except I could not ...
customer_reviews.text: I Like the concept of the player except I could not get the volume loud enough to enjoy the music. I returned the unit because of that.
customer_reviews.author: wackdado

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for swimming
customer_reviews.text: This was my husband’s Christmas and I was quite nervous cause he is really picky with electronic. He loved it! Could last hours swimming and has improved a lot his exercises. This really works for swimming. It has a lot of ear accessories so you can use the one that fits better.
customer_reviews.author: Kattya Jiménez

product_meta.title: H2O Audio Stream 2 100% Waterproof MP3 Music Player with Bluetooth and Underwater Headphones for Swimming Laps, Watersports, Short Cord, 8GB
product_meta.description: Introducing the STREAM 100% Waterproof MP3 Player by H20 Audio. Are you looking for an underwater player that has Bluetooth? Look no further. H20 Audio has created 100% Waterproof MP3 player with Bluetooth connection. No more boring workouts with 10 hours of play time and over 2,000 songs. You can also stream music from your smart phone with Bluetooth. Just pair your smartphone (iPhone, Samsung, Android, etc.) with the STREAM player and receive Spotify, Pandora music from your phone. *NOTE: Bluetooth does NOT work underwater. H2O Audio Waterproof technology ensures this MP3 player performs even when submerged to 12ft (3m), comes with a waterproof rating of IPX8 and a wireless range of 30ft/10m. Download all your favorite music from your computer (supports MP3, WMA, FLAC, APE formats). Shuffle through all your music in the memory. The rotating 360 snap-clip helps you attach your device to anything like, goggles, and swimsuit or board shorts. This MP3 player is compatible with all H2O Audio headphones. 1 year warranty included. Specs: Bluetooth 100% waterproof MP3 player 100% waterproof even when submerged to 12ft (3m) of water Waterproof rating: IPX8. 10 hours of play time Memory capacity of over 2,000 songs (8 GB) Supports MP3, WMA, FLAC, APE formats Shuffle Function: shuffle through all your music in the memory Listen to music, audiobooks, podcasts, and more. Rotating 360 Snap-Clip: easily attaches at any angle to any item like your goggles, swimsuit or board shorts. Compatible with any H2O Audio headphones. Included free pre-loaded relaxing music to get you going Easy drag-and-drop music syncing Extra-short cord never gets tangled or difficult to manage. Each headphone comes with 8 sizes of earbud tips to get your best fit. Sweat proof Noise Cancelling NOTE: Bluetooth does NOT work underwater. Wireless range 30ft/10m. Includes 1 Year Warranty Uses: Swimming, Exercising, Sports Activities
feature_bullets: NO MORE CONVERSION ISSUES: You asked for it – and We Made it Better! The New Stream 2 now supports Apple iTunes music (m4a) and all other MP3, WMA, FLAC, APE formats. Now you can simply copy/paste or drag & drop any music from your computer to the memory without the need to converting to mp3. Plus you get 10 hours of play time with shuffle and memory capacity of over 2,000 songs (8 GB)

SUPERIOR SOUND: The included H2O Audio Surge stereo headphones are engineered to provide you with superior sound and deep amplified bass. They are patented with a seal-tight jack which will reduce any USB connection issues and long term corrosion. The dedicated volume and track buttons make it easier to adjust the volume and find just the right song with the dedicated skip and fast-forward buttons that help you advance your music or audio books

BLUETOOTH CONNECTION: The STREAM 2 can easily pair with your smart phone over a wireless Bluetooth connection. Pair your smartphone (iPhone, Samsung, Android etc.) with the STREAM 2 player and receive Spotify, Pandora music from your phone. No more boring workouts with 10 hours of play time and over 2,000 songs. NOTE: Bluetooth does NOT work underwater. Wireless range 30ft/10m

100% WATERPROOF: Patented designed with the highest waterproof rating of IPX8. H2O Audio waterproof technology allows headphones to withstand heavy perspiration, rinsing after active use, and submersion to 12ft (3m) underwater, for an unlimited amount of time. No other earbuds will match our quality and sound. You can enjoy all your outdoor activities like swimming, running, working out and sports without any worries

HYDRODYNAMIC DESIGN: All our products have been ergonomic designed for the purpose of use in water. The speaker shape sits flush with the ear and is designed to promote proper alignment of the earbud. Our 360 Snap-Clip: Easily attaches to your goggles, swimsuit or board shorts. Rotate the clip to find the best angle for your needs. When you compare our product to others you will see there is no comparison

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars428 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
